name: Confession at the Bottom of the Glass
description: Bold questions that uncover the group’s deepest secrets. Ready for the truth?

dares.title: Most Daring Act
dares.action: ${c_player}, what is the craziest thing you’ve ever done?

dares.title: Secret Date
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever had a secret romance?

dares.title: Shameful Secret
dares.action: ${r_player}, which secret still makes you blush?

dares.title: First Love
dares.action: ${c_player}, who was your first love?

dares.title: Forbidden Desire
dares.action: ${c_player}, name one hidden desire.

dares.title: Hidden Envy
dares.action: ${c_player}, who in the group do you envy the most and why?

dares.title: Awkward Moment
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s the most embarrassing moment of your life?

dares.title: Worst Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us about your worst kiss.

dares.title: Biggest Lie
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s the biggest lie you’ve told someone close?

dares.title: Forbidden Crush
dares.action: ${c_player}, who did you like even though it was forbidden or awkward?

dares.title: Secret Weakness
dares.action: ${c_player}, what secret weakness do you have that few people know about?

dares.title: Strangest Place
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s the most unusual place you’ve kissed someone?

dares.title: Biggest Regret
dares.action: ${c_player}, what do you regret most in life?

dares.title: Fake Feelings
dares.action: ${r_player}, have you ever pretended to be in love?

dares.title: Hidden Feelings
dares.action: ${c_player}, who in this group do you like more than just a friend?

dares.title: Boldest Fantasy
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s your boldest fantasy?

dares.title: Rejected Confession
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever been rejected?

dares.title: Double Game
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever dated two people at the same time?

dares.title: Worst Deed
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s the worst thing you’ve ever done?

dares.title: Bad Habit
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s your worst habit?

dares.title: Dating Disaster
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us about your most disastrous date.

dares.title: Loveless Relationship
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever been in a relationship without love?

dares.title: Uncomfortable Truth
dares.action: ${c_player}, what awkward truth do you still hide from loved ones?

dares.title: Odd Attraction
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell us about your strangest romantic crush.

dares.title: Hidden Grudge
dares.action: ${r_player}, who here do you still hold a grudge against?

dares.title: Worst Gift
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s the worst gift you’ve ever received?

dares.title: Public Embarrassment
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever had a public blunder?

dares.title: Bad Friend
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever betrayed a friend?

dares.title: Hidden Fear
dares.action: ${c_player}, what fear do you keep secret from everyone?

dares.title: Love for an Ex
dares.action: ${c_player}, do you still have feelings for an ex?

dares.title: Guilty Pleasure
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s your guilty pleasure?

dares.title: Secret Dream
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you had a dream you’re embarrassed to share?

dares.title: Wildest Adventure
dares.action: ${c_player}, what’s the boldest adventure you’ve taken on?

dares.title: Lie for Gain
dares.action: ${r_player}, have you ever lied for your own benefit?

dares.title: Most Painful Breakup
dares.action: ${c_player}, which breakup hurt you the most?

dares.title: Secret Messaging
dares.action: ${c_player}, are you keeping a secret chat right now?

dares.title: Broken Promise
dares.action: ${c_player}, what promise have you broken?

dares.title: Hidden Contempt
dares.action: ${c_player}, whom here do you secretly despise at times?

dares.title: Secret Friend
dares.action: ${c_player}, do you have a secret friend nobody knows about?

dares.title: Inappropriate Thoughts
dares.action: ${c_player}, what are the most inappropriate thoughts that have crossed your mind at the wrong time?

dares.title: Using Someone
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever used someone for your own benefit?

dares.title: Hidden Dissatisfaction
dares.action: ${r_player}, what secretly bothers you about the group?

dares.title: Unexpected Rejection
dares.action: ${c_player}, whom have you turned down unexpectedly and why?

dares.title: Double Life
dares.action: ${c_player}, have you ever led a double life?

dares.title: Unmet Expectations
dares.action: ${c_player}, who in the group has let you down?

dares.title: Secret Judgment
dares.action: ${c_player}, what do you secretly judge ${r_player} for?

dares.title: Betrayal for Love
dares.action: ${c_player}, would you betray a friend for love?

dares.title: Lying to Yourself
dares.action: ${c_player}, what do you still lie to yourself about?

dares.title: Million-Dollar Question
dares.action: ${c_player}, would you reveal all your secrets for a million dollars?
